original_title: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club: Live In Paris
overview: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club – Live In Paris was recorded at the Theatre Trianon on February 24, 2014, during BRMC's sold-out tour of Europe. The concert spans Black Rebel Motorcycle Club’s entire history including favorites such as “Beat The Devil’s Tattoo”, “Spread Your Love”, and “Whatever Happened To My Rock ‘N’ Roll”.
title: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club: Live In Paris
